TEXT.TITLE: CJI INDUSTIRES INC <CJIIA> 4TH QTR NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr profit 60 cts vs loss 55 cts Oper net profit 928,000 vs loss 88,000 Revs 48.7 mln vs 39.7 mln Avg shrs 3.7 mln vs 1.5 mln Year Oper shr loss 1.17 dlrs vs loss 60 cts Oper net profit 2,537,000 vs profit 587,000 Revs 178.8 mln vs 117.6 mln NOTE: Per share figures come after preferred dividends. Excludes fourth quarter and full year 1986 extraordinary gains of 29 cts and 71 cts per share, respectively. Reuter
